metadata.title: CVE-2022-47516 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the libsofia-sip fork in drachtio-server before0.8.20. It allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemoncrash) via a crafted UDP message that leads to a failure of thelibsofia-sip-ua/tport/tport.c self assertion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsofia-sip-ua-glib3 - 1.12.11+20110422.1-2.1+deb10u3ubuntu0.20.04.1
libsofia-sip-ua0 - 1.12.11+20110422.1-2.1+deb10u3ubuntu0.20.04.1
sofia-sip-bin - 1.12.11+20110422.1-2.1+deb10u3ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sofia-sip package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.11+20110422.1-2.1+deb10u3ubuntu0.20.04.1').
